```{r gentab, echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(reactable)
library(googlesheets4)
library(dplyr)

syllabus <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1J4VAFUhskHjTXF_zJMgnPlMH9dr8vSXAt2K5lBi0vyg/edit?usp=sharing") %>% 
  mutate(Status = "Scheduled")


reactable(
  syllabus,
  sortable =TRUE,
  columns = list(
    # Or using raw HTML
    Materials = colDef(html = TRUE, cell = function(value, index) {
      sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">%s</a>', syllabus$Links[index], value)
    }), 
    Status = colDef(cell = function(value) {
      class <- paste0("tag status-", tolower(value))
      htmltools::div(class = class, value)
      }),
    Links = colDef( show = F,)
  )
)


```
